Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates board that contains BoardRows based on BoardNodes
    Version:
    27 October, 2018
    Author:
    Dmytro Sytnik (VanArman), Ahmed Romih (decarbonite)

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      private static int boardRows 
      protected static int money 
      protected static int score 
      private int zombiesToSpawn

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPlant(int x, int y, Plant plant)
      Adds Plant object on a specific coordinate
      void addZombie(int x, int y, Zombie zombie)
      Adds Zombie object on a specific coordinate
      private void fightPlantZombie()
      Simulates fight between Zombies and Plants on each row and if Plant kill Zombie add point to the player
      boolean[] gameEnds()
      Check is the game ends
      protected void generateNewPlant()
      Randomly generates Plants on the board
      private void generateNewZombie()
      Randomly generates zombies on the board across rows starting on the right of the board
      private void moveZombies()
      Move Zombies across board in each row
      protected void printBoard()
      Console print of the board
      void runBoard()
      Main method that runs the Zombie generation, simulates fight method, moves zombies across board and prints board.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board(int numberOfRows,
             int numberOfColumns,
             int zombiesToSpawn,
             int score,
             int money)
        Default constructor
        Parameters:
        numberOfRows - int number of rows
        numberOfColumns - int number of BoardNode instances in each row
        zombiesToSpawn - int number of zombies that would be randomly generated
        score - int initial score for the game (round)
        money - int initial amount of money

    • Method Detail

      • printBoard

        protected void printBoard()
        Console print of the board

      • moveZombies

        private void moveZombies()
        Move Zombies across board in each row

      • fightPlantZombie

        private void fightPlantZombie()
        Simulates fight between Zombies and Plants on each row and if Plant kill Zombie add point to the player

      • runBoard

        public void runBoard()
        Main method that runs the Zombie generation, simulates fight method, moves zombies across board and prints board.

      • gameEnds

        public boolean[] gameEnds()
        Check is the game ends
        Returns:
        boolean[], boolean[0] = true if game is end; false otherwise. boolean[1] = true Zombie won; false if Plants won

      • generateNewZombie

        private void generateNewZombie()
        Randomly generates zombies on the board across rows starting on the right of the board

      • generateNewPlant

        protected void generateNewPlant()
        Randomly generates Plants on the board
